website_summaries.verdict: The Vizio M501D-A2R is a surprisingly stylish, affordable LED-backlit HDTV that sports tons of features, good picture quality, and out-of-the-box 3D for eight people.
cons: 3D shows crosstalk when viewed too close or off-axis
Dark scenes can look slightly muddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this TV after reviewing the CNET reviews on the tv compared to the samsungs. I have a samsung LED Smart tv in our house and wanted to go larger for our living room but the standard price is around 1600 dollars, and after comparrison this tv was equal to if not better in many areas for half the price. Excellent 3D, however the only issue I run into once and awhile is the wifi doesn't connect and you have to be directly in front of the tv to use the remote (from the side doesn't work as great if your lucky to get it to work at all). Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Prisco

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good enough but not as good a picture as the very old Sony rear-projection it replaced. When the screen is supposed to be totally black one can see some of the side lights lit stronger than others so it is really a mess. This is not too noticable during regular viewing. The picture looks too artificial--movies look like afternoon soaps. The 3D is good, however. A little grainey but that is to be expected. $700 would be an appropriate price. I paid too much.
customer_reviews.author: B. Killen

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO Warranty Does Not Mean Much
customer_reviews.text: TV is malfunctioning after only 9 months of use. The screen has gone dark and blurry. Amazon will only refer you to the manufacturer, and VIZIO is a nightmare to deal with on fixing the TV. After 3 weeks -- and promises to fix the TV -- I have not received a phone call from VIZIO or the HD repair service that they use. I would think twice about buying a VIZIO TV. They are not in any hurry to offer support for defective products. I should have bought a TV from WalMart or Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This is by far the best TV I've ever owned. I don't really write reviews but A brief one here, I think, is in order. The quality of the picture literally unbelievable. You think you'really there! The 1080p is nothing short of glorious. The 3d is almost as good as the movie theater (maybe better). Comes with a bunch of free 3d glasses, all the intuitive apps, wifi, etc. For $788 with free shipping a no tax proves that Amazon is simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Throw away the remote, and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn't work most of the time. I have to remove the batteries form the remote and re-insert them to make it work again. From reading other reviews I see that this is a common problem and even the replacement remotes from Vizio have the same issue. I've gone ahead and ordered a different model remote for about $15 instead of wasting my time on the phone with Vizio tech support only to have them send me another broken remote so I can waste even more of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: perfect tv.... flakey remote
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv! The 3d was way better the the active Samsung I had before this. Only complaint I have is the remote. Constantly lags or doesn't work. When it does work it is great! Built in apps are perfect and save having to have a different device on. I hesitate putting 4 stars instead of 5 just because of the remote buts its been almost a year and it bothers me daily. Ive even read the forums to try and fix it woth no luck.
customer_reviews.author: AdamM

customer_reviews.title: great smart HDTV
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Initially netflix app didnt work, but after calling customer service it all works now. Only reason 4 instead of 5 stars is due to the packaging....not very good, had a hole in the box and almost was falling apart. The TV has a dent in the bottom bezel, but thankfully it does not effect the picture so I didnt bother trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: najnad

customer_reviews.title: Good price to performance value
customer_reviews.text: Can't think of anything negative about this TV. Picture quality is very good, tweaked the color settings, but several of the stock settings are pretty close to start with. These are highly dependent on individual preferences and viewing conditions anyway. Great price to performance value.
customer_reviews.author: Cali B

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: We have always been Sony buyers, but this Visio is the best electronic purchase we have ever made. It is everything Visio says it is and more. You can't really appreciate the awsome picture until you see it. Thank you Amazon for carrying this product at a very competative price and your superb delivery service. Can't wait to buy one for our bedroom. Would highly recommend this Visio M-Series to all TV watchers.
customer_reviews.author: Lois L.

customer_reviews.title: SO/SO
customer_reviews.text: 13 MONTHS AND IT'S DOWN. I PURCHASE THE 5 YEAR COVERAGE. GLAD I DID AS I WOULD HAVE BEEN OIUT $800.00. IT HAS BEEN MESS GETTING SOMEONE OIUT AND THE TV REPLACED. BUT, WHAT IS NOT A MESS IN THIS DAY AND AGE WHEN IT COMES TO REPAIRED.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great TV! Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this tv. It has a good picture and works great. When we mounted it on the wall, we snapped the antennae port off by pulling to hard on the cord. We called Vizio and they were great. They sent us a replacement tv and put it on the wall for us. I will look to Vizio first for my next tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hess

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO = High visual quality + features
customer_reviews.text: After nearly 4 months of enjoying the visual sharpness in the dvd,gaming and regular programming in 1080p. The positive comments before my purchase live up to the features. I would highly recommend this tv modle. Perfect color balance I cannot really compare this modle to any others simply because this is my first 50" tv. But i have viewed a couple of friends different brand names... still no comparison. Dislikes, very minor. Sound quality needs to be more amp. Better depth.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm greer

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas to me
customer_reviews.text: Picture clarity is incredible. 3D was excellent. Style is great and the quality is excellent as well. I am replacing a Samsung which we put in the bedroom. It works great and I always thought it had a beautiful picture even though it is only 60hz. This Vizio at 240hz blows it away. I am completely happy with my purchase and I have not even tweaked the picture yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Portee

customer_reviews.title: Overall great TV & great buy
customer_reviews.text: Many features for the money. Easy to set up and I was able to hang on the wall myself. Disappointed that there are no controls on the TV, not even a power button. You need the remote for everything. Also no PC input to use as a monitor, had to convert VGA to HDMI to get it to work, a $75 cost.
customer_reviews.author: LJGrube

customer_reviews.title: Screen started messing up really bad about a month after warranty went out
customer_reviews.text: Screen started messing up really bad about a month after warranty went out, won't be buying vizio, best advice and just save a little more for a better name brand
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture...but PLEASE Amazon and VIZIO enable Watchlist for Prime customers!
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio M501d-A2R has a crystal clear picture. The Vizio's speakers are weak, so I connected the TV to a stereo system. I installed the updates and manually tweaked the picture settings and am much happier with the picture now, rather than how it was out of the box. I doubt I will ever purchase another movie theater ticket - I like my home theater much, much better. At $799.00 plus free shipping with Amazon Prime, the Vizio 3D Smart LED HDTV was a very good value. 8/3/2013 Update: AMAZON AND VIZIO, PLEASE FIX THE AMAZON APP SO WE CAN ACCESS OUR WATCHLIST!!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great, easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: This tv works great. The picture was terrific and love the smart features. 3d is very neat. Also, enjoy the ability to hook up to Amazon prime and watch movies regularly. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: It's Not a Deal Unless It Works

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the picture quality and features on this tv. Compared side by side at best buy before i purchased and was blown away by the pic quality better than a samsung and for less than half the price! I haven,t watched 3d yet but am waiting to get the sound bar to enjoy the complete 3d movie experience as we bought this mainly for movies. Shipping was awesome was at front door in two days and I bought the used like new which was exactly as described with shipping tape still on TV.
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery man carried it in, unboxed it, helped put on the stand and helped with a quick set up to make sure it worked. Love the picture. The wifi works good and the 3D is better than the theaters. A really good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Linn Rash

customer_reviews.title: great tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Tv has a spectacular picture. I have had several people tell me it is the best picture they have ever seen. I have not used the 3D aspect yet so I cannot vouch for that yet, but for all the features it comes with, it is certainly a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Smde

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO M501d-A2R 50-inch 1080p 240Hz 3D Smart LED HDTV
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love everything about it! The color and picture is like you were there. Just beautiful color! Everything works great! Not any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Vizio M50 Review
customer_reviews.text: I have now been able to play around with this TV for only a few days. Watched a few HD TV shows and a movie using the 3DGO app that comes pre-installed. I could not be happier with the decision and this TV's performance to be able to display crystal clear images on all of the following: Movies, regular TV, 3D movies, and games using the Xbox 360. Vizio has certainly improved their street cred with me!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Remote control SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Love the T.V. I HATE the remote you have to keep pushing and pushing buttons and you better make sure your pointing at the exact area of the T.V. to work..But the T.V. is amazing
customer_reviews.author: neal stockman

customer_reviews.title: TV is working great with no problems at all
customer_reviews.text: Still using this today! TV is working great with no problems at all. In the market for their 4k version but will be keeping this TV! Currently use PS4 & XBox One on this TV!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Awful Remote
customer_reviews.text: The tv itself is outstanding. Beautifully thin with a great picture. The biggest let down with this television is the remote. Like others have said it is pretty terrible. It seems as though it is not responsive, at first I thought it was broken. Which is probably what will happen when I throw it in frustration. Regardless, using the remote provided from your cable provider works just fine and makes this 4 star product a 5.
customer_reviews.author: dominic petrucci

customer_reviews.title: 50 inch light bleed is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely atrocious the corner light bleed I received on my 50 incher. Sure, normal to bright scenes look fantastic on this set. I actually enjoy smooth motion set to low. But what I can't stand is every time there's a dark scene the light bleed completely ruins the moment. Sure you can tone down the bleed a bit but I can't get it to go away 100%. This puppy is going back to Amazon :(
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Throw away tvs
customer_reviews.text: Tv started messing up right after the warranty the panel is deffective and vizio wouldn't replace it
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good tv.
customer_reviews.text: Good TV and I use it for a while now and no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Natty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: No complains the built in software is good, picture is very good. Good for gaming. 3D is not that great but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got a great price ...excellent picture quality and support service ...
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav G.

customer_reviews.title: great picture
customer_reviews.text: easy setup, sharp picture and integrates with wifi easily.simple remote and apps work well.wish it had printed user manual butthe online manual is simple to navigate
customer_reviews.author: Loel L.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK TV
customer_reviews.text: don't buy anything from vizio, they are designed to fail just after a year, look all over the internet, I paided almost $900 for this set and 2 months after warranty was over they did an update over the internet and my tv had horizontal lines that wouldn't go away, said the display needed replaced for $400 plus service and shipping. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM VIZIO
customer_reviews.author: hoover

customer_reviews.title: affordable an worth it! I'm pretty sure you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Would recommend this! Cheap an affordable an easy to set up. Plus updates itself so need to worry about that
customer_reviews.author: Castiello Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Its a great buy however vizio should start spending some more time reviewing their remote controlls. I bought two last year and one came with a defective control. However its well worth the money and the 3D is amazing. The thin edges makes it sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Romero

customer_reviews.title: TV Arrived After Its Guanteed Date
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived late after Amazon sent me an email guaranteeing a December 24th delivery date (which most of the blame belongs to UPS). The TV was much bigger than what I imagined when it arrived on December 27th. The TV itself is beautiful and the 3D visuals are stunning and impressive. DVDs and Blue Rays play full screen and the images are crisp....but the 3D is fantastic and sometimes floats off the screen. There was also very poor communication about the UPS shipping delays from both Amazon and UPS.....disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Lord Vader

customer_reviews.title: Love my new TV
customer_reviews.text: I love my new TV, the picture is great, very easy to hook-up, works great with my wireless network, plenty of inputs, the 3D is awesome, I definitely recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked with how much I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I just moved out on my own and bought this TV prior to moving. I was trying to get the best bang for my buck, and I was not disappointed. You will see reviews talking about the Lag with the remote but a recent update to the TV solved the problem. Everytime someone comes over they compliment my tv. It is impressive, they have a hrd time believing the brand is VIZO. The only downside is the glare issue, depending on wher you place it it might not be a factor. I would suggest this TV to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paige T.

customer_reviews.title: Our Vizio Smart HDTV
customer_reviews.text: We are loving it! ! ! ! ! Who needs to go to the movie theatre? We don't! We've got it at home. We pop the popcorn and we are ready to go! Bodacious indeed! -Tonya C.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya Cineus

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: talk about money well spent hmmmmm fast shipping true to every thin g that's said about it my family and i enjoy a lot of movie night together hardly even go to the movies again we love thanks
customer_reviews.author: julie ann brewster

customer_reviews.title: Faster than its predecessor
customer_reviews.text: I had the 46 Inch model before this one and upgraded. I have no complaints. Screen selection and apps are faster than the older one and has a great image. There are 4 HDMI ports which was an important afterthought so I thought I'd mention it here and the greatest thing is then I turn on my PS3, it turns on the TV and\or switches to the PS3 port :). Very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Products Finder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece!! Though I wish it had 220 volts power also
customer_reviews.author: bits

customer_reviews.title: Best value TV ever!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this TV. Great picture, 3D is awesome, the apps are the bomb. We are so happy with this purchase. After replacing the old projection LED TV, it took us a while to get used to the very sharp HD picture, but I wouldn't have anything else now. And with the extra HDMI and USB slots on the back, I couldn't ask for more option. Originally it was on back order estimated at 3 months. But we had the TV in less than a month. And the price?! Can't beat it with a stick. Buy this TV, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: excellent picture, very good wifi streaming. 3D looks good. has the best ratio of screen size to set size of any TV I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: newsense

customer_reviews.title: Best TV EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We totally love this tv - it comes with 8 pairs of 3D glasses for 3D movies - totally ROCKS! So clear it look like you are there!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best model, best quality
customer_reviews.text: Best model, best quality, best picture. I would highly recommend this product to anyone. Love the TV and family does too. Thanks JJ.
customer_reviews.author: ARION H.howdy zzz)did oh dhfj

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a Great prince
customer_reviews.text: 3d is better than I expected.... This Television has a great picture and is packed with features. The only con I can think of is the sometimes slow response of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: great for money and great for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Love tv loved seeing snow fly through my room with the 3d. Vizio is a family brand to me . I bought a Samsung last time and was glad I got a vizio again. Customer for life
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you get. I looked quite a while and this TV had everything I wanted and the price was the best compared to other brands that had the same specs.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W Sapp

customer_reviews.title: great so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: TV meets my expectations. With the exception of the speakers the unit is great. Watching football is the best experience.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Linske

customer_reviews.title: One of the best values for the price
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the bells and whistles however the remote control requires a direct pointing to the left bottom corner of the TV to work effectively
customer_reviews.author: Homer Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, Amazing picture. Super easy setup. NO issues with remote but finding the right sound volume is tough at times
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, with a few quarks
customer_reviews.text: It is a great TV, the picture is incredible for the price. The local dimming is great to, and the motion is very smooth! My only main gripe is that the remote is horrible! It feels cheap and works on occasion, plus it has no keyboard for faster searching in the apps. I have found qwerty remotes on amazon for about $13 so I will be ordering one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P. Haldane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv worth the money. Only thing is the speakers on the TV are not that great. Got a sound bar and everything is awesome now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Groves

customer_reviews.title: What a nice TV!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up, simple to do adjustments, great picture and at a GREAT price! The screen is glossier than my old samsung but it does not detract from the viewing pleasure and it is in a very bright room. Haven't tried the 3D yet but that's not why I bought this TV anyway. The Netflix app is very good ( I haven't used any other just yet ) I am keeping my Apple TV hooked up so I can stream my music and with all the extra HDMI ports it's not a problem. This is the second Vizio TV that I have purchased and I can't say enough about them! Very impressed...
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV....wish I could buy another for the bedroom. No problems hooking up and what a beautiful picture. Would certainly recommend to anyone who will listen!
customer_reviews.author: DivaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great! Love the 3D and Smart TV features! Direct TV technician said it was the best picture that he had seen on a VIZIO TV ever! Wow, I would have agree. The picture is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ecc

customer_reviews.title: Love the TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV, the sound could be better. Also the remote doesn't have very good range. Other than that the TV picture is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a year now and it is great. Great picture, connectivity with the built in Apps and many more to download. The only downside is the remote which is a little clunky. They even did a firmware update and it helped, but didn't totally fix all its issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burge

customer_reviews.title: This is a phenomenal TV! The clarity that you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal TV! The clarity that you see watching a golf match in itself makes the Vizio worth every penny . . .
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Osterman

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Bought it my my sister; colors are great, and so is the 3d. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BigBeard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very low power consumption and an excellent picture at a very good price too! Vizio seems to have designed a nice TV.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this TV! The internet apps are easy to use. The 3D picture and the regular 2D picture have amazing clarity. It was easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. The 3D works great. Convenient with the 4 HDMI inputs. Very easy to connect to everything and start watching immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... year of owning this tv the picture is still excellent.
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year of owning this tv the picture is still excellent.
customer_reviews.author: gymiski woods

customer_reviews.title: I'm just sorry I did not get the 55" model
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up. Excellent Picture. I assume that this product will give me the service and pleasure as Vizio products in the past
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Ghia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this for a short time, but can say that the picture is absolutely beautiful. So crisp and clear, it almost looks 3D. Sound is fair, but that is to be expected with TVs that now have their speakers in the back. I think they do this to maintain the sleek look. Ours is hooked up to a sound system, so it does not matter. We have two backlit Vizios and are very happy with both. You just have to be careful of the model you choose, because they vary greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO M501d-A2R 50-Inch 1080p 240Hz 3D Smart LED HDTV
customer_reviews.text: so far its working great. color is good. sound is good. i was accustomed to seeing 3D at Holloywood studios and disney. the 3D on this dose not compare to what i saw at disney, not even close. so i am disappointed in the 3D. initially i had problems with the remote but that has been resolved with some help from the folks at Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rahaman

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: It's been a month an a half .. No problems. Still trying to pick out a sound bar or theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Once Twice...

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great picture. Only problem is there are no buttons on the actual set. Just an on/off switch. I worry if I lose or break my remote:/
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vlastaridis

customer_reviews.title: 240Hz Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about the extra cost of 240Hz, but now I am glad I did it. Great Picture!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I found this TV on sale at other stores but Amazon gave me a better deal. Good looking TV with apps in a affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joze

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck in all HDTV land
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV A must buy if you want a HDTV Don't know why people have problems with the remote Are they holding it backwards?
customer_reviews.author: barker

customer_reviews.title: beutifull tv
customer_reviews.text: very nice features.fair price.it fulfil our need.till now(twenty days)no problems.most peoples will like this tv.you will not be regret to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Chow

customer_reviews.title: very good tv got the 501d its the best
customer_reviews.text: its way better than i expected its crazy the only thing it doesnt have is an alarm to wake me up
customer_reviews.author: jammal young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! More than I expected.. Would buy product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: first high tech tv
customer_reviews.text: This is my familys first tv since our 32 inch tube tv and I must say that it is fantastic. I posted on facebook while watching the hockey game yesterday man it was crazy. It has great color and was a really great deal @800 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much glare
customer_reviews.text: Display is not as bright as I expected. And there is a lot of glare from surrounding light sources. This was not present in my previous LCD TV that was in the same location. On the other hand, the apps to get to Amazon video and Netlix work well.
customer_reviews.author: Bloomington Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the purchase and I'm amazed at the picture quality! Great Price for a 240 hertz 55 inch LED TV
customer_reviews.author: Damon Callicott

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are a let down.. and the smartness of the tv is ok ok. the remote is a bit hard..
customer_reviews.author: ivarnahs

customer_reviews.title: USB INPUT/OUTPUT Port
customer_reviews.text: No instructions! I would like to display photographs. Is the USB output port used for recording? Where can I find instructions.
customer_reviews.author: James Haas

customer_reviews.title: Not crystal clear...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous Samsung LED TV (50" , 120 Hz), this Vizio TV isn't as crystal clear nor vivid as Samsung. I can't really see the difference between 240 Hz or 120 Hz.. I think the only thing better is the 3D capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: cant believe what happen ????
customer_reviews.text: I order this tv July but had it stored just used it few days ago worked fine for few hours then the screen started to flipper every few seconds I though it was the cable but I was wrong and also there was a visable line coming from right corner of the tv and now I can't even get a refund this sucks I was looking forward to used this tv and what I got was a few hour piece of junk now k do t no what to do any suggestions please reply thanks.
customer_reviews.author: roy stanford miller bodden

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, good apps.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV with very clear picture and sound. The only negative I have with the TV are the apps, but I also have a Chromecast so it all works out. In addition to the Chromecast I use HitBliss to rent an Amazon movie per day, essentially for free. HitBliss says the movie must be viewed within 24 hours, but Amazon will let you wait for 30 days before the movie needs to be started; then you have 24 hours to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

product_meta.title: VIZIO M501d-A2R 50-Inch 1080p 3D Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
product_meta.description:
The all-new M-Series 50" (49.5" diag.) Razor LED Smart TV with Theater 3D has arrived with an ultra-modern design, brilliant picture quality, and a new, faster VIZIO Internet Apps Plus experience. Give any room an easy "designer home" makeover with the signature design of the M-Series, featuring an ultra-thin bezel that virtually vanishes next to the nearly edge-to-edge display. Enjoy stunning picture quality with the latest technology: Razor LED with Smart Dimming for vivid colors and deep contrast, Full HD 1080p and 240Hz effective refresh rate with Smooth Motion enhanced with backlight scanning for the sharpest possible picture. Now with the new, faster VIZIO Internet Apps Plus Smart TV experience, get connected with built-in Wi-Fi to the latest hit movies, TV shows, music and more from favorites like Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, M-Go, HuluPlus, and Pandora. Plus, watch 3D movies with Theater 3D for a crystal-clear, flicker free, and visibly brighter picture than conventional 3D. VIZIO M-Series: It’s the must-have entertainment upgrade you’ve been waiting for.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The stylishly modern VIZIO M-Series 50" Razor LED Smart TV with Theater 3D is crafted to redefine your entertainment experience with near edge-to-edge picture and must-have features that elevate your viewing to a new level.

M-Series TVs feature a razor-thin profile made possible by dazzling premium Razor LED backlighting that lines the interior perimeter of every M-Series screen and delivers brilliant picture at a fraction of the space and energy usage.

Hundreds of apps. Millions of fans.

The all-new VIZIO Internet Apps Plus is now easier to use than ever. Its newly expanded apps library is your gateway to a virtually limitless world of the best streaming content, from hit movies and TV shows to music and more, while an updated user interface features full-screen searching* to make the most ingenious Smart TV platform intuitively simple.

*Full Screen Apps Window functionality to be available Summer 2013. Image simulated.

Quicker & Smarter

A revamped user interface 
lets you navigate quicker 
and more easily.

More Apps Than Ever

A newly expanded apps 
library adds to an already
unrivaled selection.

Full-Screen Apps Window*

A full-screen window makes
finding and organizing your
apps a breeze.

Built-In Wi-Fi

Ultra-fast Wi-Fi provides
an easy clutter-free
Internet connection.

Edge To Edge-Of-Your-Seat Brilliance. 

The new VIZIO M-Series is loaded with advanced technologies that push LCD brilliance to new heights. Innovations like Theater 3D, Razor LED with Smart Dimming, a 240Hz effective refresh rate, 1080p Full HD and 10M:1 dynamic contrast ratio bring a state-of-the-art viewing experience to life right on your screen.

Theater 3D

Cinema-quality 3D technology delivers a noticeably brighter picture with a wider range of viewing angles. Includes 8 pairs of battery-free 3D glasses.

Razor LED with Smart Dimming

Brilliant LCD is lined with premium LED backlighting, enhanced with intelligent local dimming zones, to deliver vibrant color with richer blacks and brighter whites for striking contrast.

Faster Refresh Rate

Effective refresh rate of 240Hz and Smooth Motion enhanced with backlight scanning capture all the action with amazing sharpness.

1080P Full HD

Crystal-clear 1920 x 1080p Full HD enhances every image with razor-sharp precision for a lifelike realism and fidelity.
